ci_support_linux_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge,defaults
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- condaforge/linux-anvil-comp7
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- '2.7'

about.description:
This simple django app enables users to upload large files to Django in multiple chunks,
with the ability to resume if the upload is interrupted.
about.summary: Upload large files to Django in multiple chunks, with the ability to resume if the upload is interrupted.

commands: python -c "import django; from django.conf import settings; settings.configure(INSTALLED_APPS=['chunked_upload']); django.setup(); import chunked_upload;"

about.description:
This simple django app enables users to upload large files to Django in multiple chunks,
with the ability to resume if the upload is interrupted.
about.summary: Upload large files to Django in multiple chunks, with the ability to resume if the upload is interrupted.

commands: python -c "import django; from django.conf import settings; settings.configure(INSTALLED_APPS=['chunked_upload']); django.setup(); import chunked_upload;"

name: django-chunked-upload
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "django-chunked-upload" %}
{% set version = "2.0.0" %}
{% set sha256 = "fb8961029d6a9febb974fb24f529c7773c61a9e6467825db861aae29e1f0c978" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
  noarch: python

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python
    - django

test:
  commands:
    - python -c "import django; from django.conf import settings; settings.configure(INSTALLED_APPS=['chunked_upload']); django.setup(); import chunked_upload;"

about:
  home: https://github.com/juliomalegria/django-chunked-upload
  license: MIT-Zero
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'Upload large files to Django in multiple chunks, with the ability to resume if the upload is interrupted.'
  description: |
    This simple django app enables users to upload large files to Django in multiple chunks, 
    with the ability to resume if the upload is interrupted.
  doc_url: https://github.com/juliomalegria/django-chunked-upload
  dev_url: https://github.com/juliomalegria/django-chunked-upload

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - xmnlab
